pagecheckout-desc: Allows exclusive rights on a page for a user
pagecheckout-error-no-checkout: Cannot check-in page that is not currently checked-out
pagecheckout-error-no-checkout-id: Check-in failure! No checkout ID set
pagecheckout-error-db-retrieve-inserted: Failed to retrieve previously inserted checkout
pagecheckout-lockdown-reason: Action "$1" is not allowed, because page is checked out by $2
apihelp-pagecheckout-clear-param-page_ti: Title of the page for which to clear checkouts
pagecheckout-ui-clear-confirm: Confirm clearing active checkout on this page? This will make page editable for all normally eligible users
log-description-pagecheckout: Tracks the state of page checkouts and checkins
logentry-pagecheckout-checkin: $1 {{GENDER:$2|checked in}} page $3 that was checked out for user $4
pagecheckout-alertbanner-checkout: This page is currently {{GENDER:$1|checked out}} for $2
pagecheckout-alertbanner-checkout-with-c: This page is currently {{GENDER:$1|checked out}} for $2. Comment: $3
page-checkout-workflow-activity-checkout: This page is currently checked out due to a running workflow
page-checkout-workflow-clear-checkout: Checkout cleared due to workflow abort
